text: A physicist is a scientist who studies physics. Here are some famous physicists: * Robert J. Lang * Albert Einstein * Archimedes * Benjamin Franklin * Blaise Pascal * Enrico Fermi * Erwin Schrödinger * Galileo Galilei * Henri Poincaré * Isaac Newton * James Watt * Johannes Kepler * Julius Robert Oppenheimer * Leó Szilárd * Marie Curie * Max Planck * Donna Strickland * Niels Bohr * Nikola Tesla * Rene Descartes * Richard Feynman * Satyendra Nath Bose * Stephen Hawking * Werner Heisenberg * C.V. Raman * Abdul Kalam * Jagadish Chandra Bose * Category:Science occupations
title: Physicist
